data.taskTitle: improve jat cli > jat -r (resume) should pass yolo flag
improve jat cli > jat -r (resume) should pass yolo flag
data.approach: Investigate how claude_flags are read from config and ensure they are passed when resuming sessions via both CLI (jat -r) and IDE resume API. The flag is already read in the IDE resume endpoint but need to verify CLI behavior.
